description: Students explore a particular period or century through examination of selected literary and
non-literary works within their socio-historical and cultural contexts. Coursework includes
discussion, analysis, and interpretation of representative works. Sample topics: "19th-Century
French Literature," "La Belle Epoque," and "20th-Century French Literature."  May be repeated if
period is different.  Taught in French.  Offered at least alternate years. Prerequisite: minimum of
